code: import{ALERT,USER}from"../../constants";import axios from"@helpers/axios/private.axios";export const changeUserNumber=_ref=>{let{code}=_ref;return async dispatch=>{const resp=await axios.post("/users/change/phone/confirm",{code});const{message,data:{phone}}=resp.data;dispatch({type:USER.USER_FIELD,payload:{phone}});dispatch({type:ALERT.ALERT_SUCCESS,payload:message});return resp.data;};};
